newsitem.title: UK: Liverpool cotton sees offers ease but business thin.
newsitem.headline: Liverpool cotton sees offers ease but business thin.

text.p: Monday's fall in New York futures led to a general weakening in offering rates for most origins of upland cotton which induced some spinners to re-examine their needs for the next few months.
But the volume of business actually concluded fell somewhat short of expectations.
Mill buyers remain generally cautious despite indications that there may not be an abundance of better quality cotton through the northern Spring and Summer.
Enquiry for such qualities was generally directed to Central Asian and West African.
